name: Soldier Grinder
description:
In this game, you grind some soldiers, well a lot of them. You grind all types of soldiers MECH soldiers, DRONE soldiers, LIGHT soldiers, and even NORMAL soldiers.  Grind your way through the town until you reach the DOOM SCRAPER filled to the brim with guards this skyscraper houses the MEGA MECH.

Go around and recruit your friends to help you on your adventure to save the town from the SOLDIERS.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space/Enter - Interact

Esc - Menu
